record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 3297
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 3297 -- (Senate - July 23, 2008)

[Page: S7089]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, S. 3297 is at the desk and due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will read the title of the bill for a second time.
The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 3297) to advance America's priorities.

speaking.paragraph: I object to any further proceedings with regard to this legislation.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar.
